entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. 30 percent chance of showers near Boston Bar early this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023
